mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.enname AS "enName", a.type AS "type", a.driver AS "driver", a.host AS "host", a.port AS "port", a.dbname AS "dbname", a.url AS "url", a.username AS "username", a.password AS "password", a.invokes AS "invokes", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plugin_datasource_link( id, name, enname, type, driver, host, port, dbname, url, username, password, invokes, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{enName}, #{type}, #{driver}, #{host}, #{port}, #{dbname}, #{url}, #{username}, #{password}, #{invokes}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE plugin_datasource_link SET name = #{name}, enname = #{enName}, type = #{type}, driver = #{driver}, host = #{host}, port = #{port}, dbname = #{dbname}, url = #{url}, username = #{username}, password = #{password}, invokes = #{invokes}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
